1267250.name: The Coin Game - Supporter Edition
1267250.description:
Do you love The Coin Game? Would you like to pay a little extra to help a true indie title grow? Well, I have the perfect option for you. This Supporter Edition DLC includes NO ADVANTAGES in the game and only includes Supporter Edition cosmetic items. The Supporter Edition in game cosmetic items are a small way for me to thank you for the extra support. The extra DLC purchase will help me to further develop the game and add even more features.

Supporter Edition DLC currently includes:
- Gold Supporter Limited Edition Smartwatch for both characters.
- Supporter Edition 4th clothing option for both characters.
- Supporter Edition Poster in Players Bedroom.
- May change in the future as I add more features and come up with cool ideas for supporters.

Thank you very much for helping and supporting The Coin Game!
1267250.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
